entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h before morning. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
